) } else { return; } } componentWillMount() { var user = localStorage.getItem('user'); user = JSON.parse(user); if(this.props.authenticated && user) { this.setState({ user: user.user }) } } render() { return ( {this.criarFesta()} ); } } function mapStateToProps(state) { return { authenticated: state.auth.authenticated }; } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CriarFesta);
